title: Australian Consumer Confidence Back in the Doldrums

title: What The Board Needs To Know
description: Everything from the week beginning April 17th, 2023 that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week, we ask whether board directors are prepared for the prospect of data leaks, plus updates on what directors need to know about the SEC’s expected cyber rules timeline, the potential for further cyber insurance rate rises and more stringent policy requirements, and a new study on the role of the chief executive in managing cyber risks.
